attributes.action: do all in his power to stop stevie thompson dumping grass cuttings at the end of my road
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: these actions are ruining the countryside for the badgers and pink panthers.several people have fell over the cuttings and never been seen again.have photo evidence his son is up to it too.ps he also drinks buckie and has an action man hair cut

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
